prompt_ru: Компания потеряла два миллиарда долларов в прошлом году

answer_en: No one was listening to him when he was trying to explain it

prompt_ru: Я был дома когда она пришла

prompt_ru: Он увлекался игрой на гитаре

answer_en: I was fond of learning English
transcription: [aɪ wɒz fɒnd ɒv ˈlɜ:nɪŋ ˈɪŋglɪʃ]

prompt_ru: Я писал письмо, когда зазвонил телефон
answer_en: I was writing a letter when the phone rang
transcription: [aɪ wɒz ˈraɪtɪŋ ə ˈletə wen ðə fəʊn ræŋ]

prompt_ru: Я увидел это, когда я открыл глаза
answer_en: I saw it when I opened my eyes

answer_en: He earned billions of dollars

prompt_ru: Компания потеряла два миллиарда долларов за неделю
answer_en: The company lost two billion dollars in a week
transcription: [ðə ˈkʌmpəni lɒst tu: ˈbɪljən ˈdɒləz ɪn ə wi:k]

answer_en: When she came home, we were having dinner

answer_en: The temperature was above zero all day yesterday

answer_en: I wasn't reading a book when she called me

answer_en: When I came back home, I turned on the computer

prompt_ru: Что удивило ее больше всего?

answer_en: It was snowing all day

answer_en: She bought a very spacious flat

answer_en: I lost my keys but then I found them

answer_en: I was doing my homework when someone knocked at the door

answer_en: No one was listening to him when he was trying to explain it

answer_en: She was doing her homework when he entered the room

answer_en: They didn't believe him, when he was telling them this story

prompt_ru: Что ты обожал делать?
answer_en: What were you fond of doing?
transcription: [wɒt wɜ: ju: fɒnd ɒv ˈdu:ɪŋ?]

prompt_ru: Я занимался серфингом в Интернете, пока она делала ужин
answer_en: I was surfing the web while she was making dinner
transcription: [aɪ wɒz ˈsɜ:fɪŋ ðə web waɪl ʃi: wɒz ˈmeɪkɪŋ ˈdɪnə]

prompt_ru: Цена становилась все выше и выше
answer_en: The price was getting higher and higher
transcription: [ðə praɪs wɒz ˈgetɪŋ ˈhaɪər ænd ˈhaɪə]

prompt_ru: Что ты делал вчера в семь часов вечера?
answer_en: What were you doing yesterday at seven o'clock in the evening?
transcription: [wɒt wɜ: ju: ˈdu:ɪŋ ˈjestədeɪ æt ˈsevn əˈklɒk ɪn ði ˈi:vnɪŋ?]

prompt_ru: Что ты делал, пока ждал этого?
answer_en: What were you doing while you were waiting for it?
transcription: [wɒt wɜ: ju: ˈdu:ɪŋ waɪl ju: wɜ: ˈweɪtɪŋ fɔ: ɪt?]

prompt_ru: Тем не менее, мне удалось пройти тест
answer_en: However, I succeeded in passing the test
transcription: [haʊˈevə, aɪ səkˈsi:dɪd ɪn ˈpɑ:sɪŋ ðə test]

prompt_ru: На кого она кричала?
answer_en: Who did she shout at?
transcription: [hu: dɪd ʃi: ʃaʊt æt?]

prompt_ru: От чего это зависело?
answer_en: What did it depend on?
transcription: [wɒt dɪd ɪt dɪˈpend ɒn?]

prompt_ru: Кого ты ждал?
answer_en: Who were you waiting for?
transcription: [hu: wɜ: ju: ˈweɪtɪŋ fɔ:?]

prompt_ru: За что ты заплатил?
answer_en: What did you pay for?
transcription: [wɒt dɪd ju: peɪ fɔ:?]

prompt_ru: Снег шел, когда ты прибыл туда?
answer_en: Was it snowing when you arrived there?
transcription: [wɒz ɪt ˈsnəʊɪŋ wen ju: əˈraɪvd ðeə?]
